overview:
Rupert is a cofounder of Verteego, and is in charge of product management. Prior to this, he had gained significant experience as a consultant first in strategy with manufacturing accounts, then in sustainable development & procurement.

Rupert earned a bachelor’s degree in Economics from the University of Clermont Ferrand, Auvergne, and a master’s degree in Management Science from HEC & TÃ©lÃ©com Paris.
